dmca.title: DMCA Violation from user
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

 

Legal Response Team


________________________________

From: Mike Snyder [mailto:mike@phillipsproductions.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, October 12, 2006 10:19 AM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: DMCA Violation from user
Subject: DMCA Violation from user


Dear EV1.net:
 
I would like to report a DMCA violation at the following location:
 
http://users3.ev1.net/%7Eabraxox/Skidboot.html
<http://users3.ev1.net/%7Eabraxox/Skidboot.html> 
 
The video segment on the previous webpage is from the copyrighted TV
show "Texas Country Reporter" produced and distributed by Phillips
Productions, Inc. 
 
Please contact regarding this matter:
 
Mike Snyder
214.741.1300 x 204
 
Thank you.
